src:
Zaradi nezakonitega prevoza migrantov prijeli tri Makedonce
05 Nov 2019, 13:08 by STA

Policisti so na Mostičju ustavili osebni avto, v katerem so bili trije državljani Makedonije ter državljana Kosova in Albanije. Policisti so pridržali makedonske državljane, ker so državljanoma Kosova in Albanije pomagali pri nezakonitem prehodu državne meje. Vse tri bodo s kazensko ovadbo privedli k preiskovalnemu sodniku.



Foto: STA

KOPER > Kot so sporočili s Policijske uprave Koper, se je izkazalo, da je bil eden od Makedoncev vodič, ki je oba potnika peš nelegalno privedel prek državne meje, druga dva Makedonca pa sta jih pričakala z osebnim vozilom v Sloveniji.
Vse tri Makedonce bodo ovadili zaradi suma storitve kaznivega dejanja prepovedanega prehajanja meje, njihova potnika pa vrnili na Hrvaško.
text:
Illegal transport of migrants detains three Macedonians
05 Nov 2019, 12:08 by STA

Police officers stopped a passenger car in Mostic, which contained three citizens of Macedonia and citizens of Kosovo and Albania. Police officers detained Macedonian citizens for helping Kosovo and Albanian citizens cross the state border illegally. All three will be brought to trial by a criminal complaint.



Photo: STA

KOPER> As reported by the Koper Police Directorate, it turned out that one of the Macedonians was a guide who illegally brought both passengers on foot across the state border, while the other two Macedonians were expecting them by car in Slovenia.
All three Macedonians will be blamed for suspected of committing the crime of crossing the border and returning their passengers to Croatia.
